pr_title: [apex] New Rule - Test Methods Must Be In Test Classes

timeline.bodyText: This file should have a xml extension
timeline.author: adangel

replies.bodyText:
And we need a JUnit Test class to start the tests - right now, the new rule is not tested at all....
Example: https://github.com/pmd/pmd/blob/master/pmd-apex/src/test/java/net/sourceforge/pmd/lang/apex/rule/bestpractices/ApexUnitTestClassShouldHaveAssertsTest.java
The test class is pretty empty, but still required
Docu: https://pmd.github.io/latest/pmd_userdocs_extending_testing.html
replies.author: adangel

replies.bodyText: For the sake of completeness: API version 27.0 (Spring '13) removed support for test methods inside of functional classes. I didn't realize that was so long ago, so probably the relevance even in legacy code is getting smaller and smaller...
replies.author: dstdia
